topic: module credit in the master's program
question: I wanted to find out whether I can have the module "MHP01001 - Assessment in Neurological Diseases and <ANONYMIZED> (Project Work)" credited only as an interdisciplinary basis or also as an elective module for my Master in Information Systems? The module starts next Monday, so I would be happy to receive a prompt response."
answer: Project weeks can only be used as an interdisciplinary basis. Unfortunately, this is not possible as an elective module for your Master's degree.
